name: More than an aesthetic experience
description:
True descentralization is only possible with distribution of wealth. Support the forest protectors. 

### this piece is part of the OYX mini-series ###

Painting are more than an aesthetic experience, they transmit history and indigenous ancestrality. Images have the power to evoke rituals, express values and magical symbols of a culture.

Beyond that, each tribe holds it’s own stamp, each design brings its authenticity and strength. 

As pinturas são mais do que uma arte estética, elas transmitem a história da ancestralidade indígena, além da ritualidade em expressar os valores e símbolos mágicos de uma cultura.
Além do mais, as marcas de cada tribo são diferentes, cada uma leva autenticidade e a força da sua etnia.
